location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to Government, to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Warden writes to inform Bruce that the Honourable Governor in Council approves of Bruce's decision to furnish the crew of the Joasmee [Āl Qāsimī] boat with provisions during its detention, and the transport of the crew back to Rasel Khyma [Ra's al-Khaymah].
